nodes.text: An electroripper staff was a type of energized staff weapon.

An electroripper staff was a partially collapsible staff weapon that was tipped with a high-voltage energy ribbon on one end, and a kinetite charge on the other. When activated, the staff extended and its blade and kinetite charge energized; the energy ribbon was capable of shredding metal and incapacitating opponents, while the kinetite charge could create shockwaves of varying intensity.
A brutal melee weapon, the leader of the Cloud-Riders, Enfys Nest, used an electroripper staff as her signature weapon.
